View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.sqlite;
2   
3   import com.jsql.model.accessible.DataAccess;
4   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
5   import org.hibernate.cfg.JdbcSettings;
6   import org.junit.jupiter.api.AfterEach;
7   import org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions;
8   import spring.SpringApp;
9   
10  import java.util.ArrayList;
11  import java.util.Collection;
12  import java.util.List;
13  import java.util.regex.Matcher;
14  import java.util.regex.Pattern;
15  
16  public abstract class ConcreteSqliteSuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
17  
18      public ConcreteSqliteSuiteIT() {
19          this.config();
20      }
21      
22      public void config() {
23          this.jdbcURL = SpringApp.propsSqlite.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_URL);
24          this.jdbcUser = SpringApp.propsSqlite.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_USER);
25          this.jdbcPass = SpringApp.propsSqlite.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_PASSWORD);
26  
27          this.databaseToInject = "musicstore";
28          this.tableToInject = "Student";
29          this.columnToInject = "Student_Id";
30          
31          this.queryAssertDatabases = "select 'sqlite_master' sqlite_master from sqlite_master WHERE type = 'table'";
32          this.queryAssertTables = "select name from sqlite_master WHERE type = 'table'";
33          this.queryAssertColumns = String.format("""
34              select sql from sqlite_master
35              where tbl_name = '%s'
36              and type = 'table'
37          """, this.tableToInject);
38          this.queryAssertValues = String.format("select %s from %s", this.columnToInject, this.tableToInject);
39      }
40      
41      @Override
42      protected Collection<String> parse(List<String> rawColumns) {
43          
44          String modelColumns = rawColumns.stream().findFirst().orElseThrow();
45          String columnsToParse = this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getSqlite().transformSqlite(modelColumns);
46          
47          Matcher regexSearch = Pattern.compile(
48                  DataAccess.MODE
49                  + DataAccess.ENCLOSE_VALUE_RGX
50                  + DataAccess.CELL_TABLE
51                  + DataAccess.ENCLOSE_VALUE_RGX
52              )
53              .matcher(columnsToParse);
54  
55          List<String> columns = new ArrayList<>();
56          
57          while (regexSearch.find()) {
58              columns.add(regexSearch.group(1));
59          }
60          
61          return columns;
62      }
63  
64      @AfterEach
65      public void checkVendor() {
66          Assertions.assertEquals(
67              this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getSqlite(),
68              this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getVendor()
69          );
70      }
71  }
